definition: Davos (Swiss ski resort)/Davos world economic forum (WEF)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Last year's bears and scolds at Davos have become this year's sages.
sentences.chinese: 去年達沃斯上的熊和罵街者變成了今年的聖人。

sentences.english: This is clear from several discussions I have heard in Davos.
sentences.chinese: 從我在達沃斯聽過的幾場討論中這一點清清楚楚。

sentences.english: Wang Jianzhou reiterates a fact and a viewpoint in Davos.
sentences.chinese: 王建宙在達沃斯重申一個事實和一個觀點。

sentences.english: They come to Davos, stay at the Four Seasons, bank in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 他們來達沃斯，入住四季酒店，在瑞士開設銀行。

sentences.english: In Davos, Switzerland, the volatility derailed the agenda at the World Economic Forum.
sentences.chinese: 在瑞士達沃斯，這種震盪打亂了世界經濟論壇的議程。

sentences.english: Of course, it is my loss.
sentences.chinese: 當然，沒去達沃斯是我的損失。

sentences.english: The Davos meeting in Switzerlandhas a strong policy focus.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士的達沃斯論壇具有很強的政策性。

sentences.english: Last year, the buzz was all about the new regime in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 去年達沃斯的關鍵字都是關於華盛頓的新政權。

sentences.english: The Summer Davos Forum is over. The Huizhan Center is now busing with the International Clothes Festival.
sentences.chinese: 達沃斯會議結束了，會展中心又在忙着爲服裝節布展。

sentences.english: The 2009 Summer Davosforum opened in Dalian, September 10th.
sentences.chinese: 9月10日2009夏季達沃斯論壇在大連開幕。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Jing1 ji4 Lun4 tan2
Ying1 guo2 Wen2 hua4 Xie2 hui4

definition: South China Morning Post (newspaper in Hong Kong)
United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change

definition: abbr. for 國際足球聯合會|国际足球联合会, FIFA, international federation of football associations

Shi4 jie4 Zi4 ran2 Ji1 jin1 hui4

definition: Stuttgart city in southwest Germany and capital of Baden-Württemberg 巴登·符騰堡州|巴登·符腾堡州[Ba1 deng1 · Fu2 teng2 bao3 zhou1]
